dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.device_id as DEVICE_ID, a.device_name as DEVICE_NAME, a.asset_number as ASSET_NUMBER, a.group_name as GROUP_NAME, a.party_name as PARTY_NAME FROM xx_cs_mps_device_b a, (select max(creation_date) cdate, device_id from xx_cs_mps_device_details group by device_id) b WHERE b.device_id = a.device_id AND b.cdate < sysdate - NVL(:p_days,7) ORDER BY a.device_id
